channel.title: 639 - Character file
channel.description: My character files save as a '.bin' how to I get them to save as something else?

item.title: 639 - Character file
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Disengage, post:1, topic:419092”]My character files save as a ‘.bin’ how to I get them to save as something else?[/quote]im assuming you want to do this for admin or mod, This is not the process you are to follow if this is what you are expecting to do,

[code]public static final String[] ADMINS = {""};//ad names here for admins

public static final String[] MODERATORS = {""}; //add names here for mods[/code]

Add this to the top of your actionsender.java

now to do the next part search for this:

then under that^ add this:

for (String admin : ADMINS) if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(admin)) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); for (String mod : MODERATORS) if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(mod)) player.getDefinition().setRights(1);

now you should be admin or mod or both XD.

Read full topic
